name: v0.1.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "ryandraves_nlb", version = "0.1.2")
```


## What's Changed
* Add a Jekyll site by @RyanDraves in https://github.com/RyanDraves/nlb/pull/5
* Add hermetic Buildifier by @RyanDraves in https://github.com/RyanDraves/nlb/pull/6
* Fix pages Bazel config by @RyanDraves in https://github.com/RyanDraves/nlb/pull/8

* add the first blog post by @RyanDraves in https://github.com/RyanDraves/nlb/pull/12

* setup basic Python client to read from a Pico by @RyanDraves in https://github.com/RyanDraves/nlb/pull/16
* Add serialized transactions by @RyanDraves in https://github.com/RyanDraves/nlb/pull/20
